description: Schema to define auto actions for a particular season

$schema.description: The schema version this file adheres to

season.description: The season this auto definition is for

version.description: The version of the auto definition

description.description: A description of this auto definition

poses.description: Definitions of poses that will be referenced by events and actions

groups.description: Group labels that will be referenced by poses

travelGroups.description: Group labels that are specifically used for travelling, not positioning (like waypoints)

locations.description: Location labels that will be referenced by poses

positions.description: Position labels that will be referenced by poses

actions.description: Action labels that will be referenced by poses

fixtures.description: Definitions of field fixtures that may be interacted with during auto

events.description: Definitions of events that will trigger targets

targets.description: Definitions of targets to be pursued during auto

sequences.description: Definitions of sequences of events to be executed during auto
